direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve generating a signature from data, with similar control flows and exception handling.
Both methods process byte arrays to produce a string output, though for different purposes (signature vs. encoding).
Both methods rely on parameter checking for type validation, which can be tested together for robustness.
Both methods involve reading and processing PEM objects, which can share similar test cases for resource handling.
Both methods involve creating a key from byte data, which can share similar test cases for key generation.
